ios.subtitle: Your Personal Sun & Moon Guide

editorialNotes.standard: Shooting movies on film may be a dying art, but just because we live in the digital age doesnt mean we have to abandon our analog past. We get warm, nostalgic fuzzies from 8mm Vintage Cameras grainy, flickery film filters and lens effects, conjuring up memories of vacation travelogues screened in wood-paneled basements. Its not just about old-school kicks, thoughthis powerful suite of tools can give any video an authentic period look.
editorialNotes.short: The easy way to create authentic vintage movies.
